events.name: Hazard reduction burns in Sydney
events.wd_description: Sydney was covered in a thick layer of smoke due to hazard reduction burns carried out over the weekend, with the process expected to continue for several months.
events.description: Sydney was covered in a thick layer of smoke due to hazard reduction burns carried out over the weekend, with the process expected to continue for several months.

events.name: Ongoing hazard reduction burns
events.wd_description: Firefighters in New South Wales will continue performing hazard reduction burns over the coming months, a yearly practice especially important in areas with properties.
events.description: Firefighters in New South Wales will continue performing hazard reduction burns over the coming months, a yearly practice especially important in areas with properties.

events.name: Smoke coverage in Sydney
events.wd_description: A thick layer of smoke covered several areas of Sydney due to the hazard reduction burns, with the smoke expected to clear over the next few days.
events.description: A thick layer of smoke covered several areas of Sydney due to the hazard reduction burns, with the smoke expected to clear over the next few days.

events.name: Community impact and response
events.wd_description: Communities are being urged to bear with the smoke, which is seen as a better alternative to the potential devastation of uncontrolled bushfires.
events.description: Communities are being urged to bear with the smoke, which is seen as a better alternative to the potential devastation of uncontrolled bushfires.

events.name: U.S. Decision to Send Cluster Munitions to Ukraine
events.wd_label: U.S. Decision to Send Cluster Munitions to Ukraine
events.wd_description: The United States has decided to send cluster munitions to Ukraine as part of a new military aid package, despite the weapons being banned by 100 countries, including U.S. allies.
events.description: The United States has decided to send cluster munitions to Ukraine as part of a new military aid package, despite the weapons being banned by 100 countries, including U.S. allies.

events.name: Approval by President Joe Biden
events.wd_description: President Joe Biden approved the transfer of cluster munitions to Ukraine after months of debates.
events.description: President Joe Biden approved the transfer of cluster munitions to Ukraine after months of debates.

events.name: Military Aid Package Details
events.wd_description: The cluster munitions will be compatible with the 155 mm howitzers previously provided by the United States, which have been instrumental in Ukraine's efforts to reclaim territory.
events.description: The cluster munitions will be compatible with the 155 mm howitzers previously provided by the United States, which have been instrumental in Ukraine's efforts to reclaim territory.

events.name: Assurances from Ukraine
events.wd_description: Ukraine has assured the United States that the cluster munitions will not be used in urban areas populated by civilians.
events.description: Ukraine has assured the United States that the cluster munitions will not be used in urban areas populated by civilians.

events.name: Dismissal of Ukrainian Ambassador to London
events.wd_label: Dismissal of Ukrainian Ambassador to London
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy has dismissed Vadym Prystaiko, Ukraine's ambassador to London, following tensions related to comments about Western military aid.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy has dismissed Vadym Prystaiko, Ukraine's ambassador to London, following tensions related to comments about Western military aid.

events.name: Dismissal Announcement
events.wd_description: President Zelenskiy announced the dismissal of Vadym Prystaiko without providing an official reason, and he was also removed as Ukraine’s representative to the International Maritime Organization.
events.description: President Zelenskiy announced the dismissal of Vadym Prystaiko without providing an official reason, and he was also removed as Ukraine’s representative to the International Maritime Organization.

events.name: Tensions Between Prystaiko and Zelenskiy
events.wd_description: Tensions arose when Prystaiko questioned some of President Zelenskiy’s behavior in a Sky News interview, leading to his dismissal.
events.description: Tensions arose when Prystaiko questioned some of President Zelenskiy’s behavior in a Sky News interview, leading to his dismissal.

events.name: Context of Western Military Aid
events.wd_description: Prystaiko’s dismissal came shortly after President Zelenskiy was asked to show more gratitude for the military help provided by the West, amidst ongoing criticism that enough is not being said about Ukrainian troops dying on the battlefield.
events.description: Prystaiko’s dismissal came shortly after President Zelenskiy was asked to show more gratitude for the military help provided by the West, amidst ongoing criticism that enough is not being said about Ukrainian troops dying on the battlefield.

events.name: DOE Funding Opportunity for EV Battery Recycling
events.wd_label: DOE Funding Opportunity for EV Battery Recycling
events.wd_description: The U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) plans to release a funding opportunity to advance electric vehicle (EV) battery recycling, transportation, and design with up to $37 million from Bipartisan Infrastructure Law (BIL) funding.
events.description: The U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) plans to release a funding opportunity to advance electric vehicle (EV) battery recycling, transportation, and design with up to $37 million from Bipartisan Infrastructure Law (BIL) funding.

events.name: BIL Section 40208
events.wd_description: The anticipated FOA supports BIL section 40208, which aims to research, develop, and demonstrate second-life applications for electric drive vehicle batteries and technologies for final recycling and disposal.
events.description: The anticipated FOA supports BIL section 40208, which aims to research, develop, and demonstrate second-life applications for electric drive vehicle batteries and technologies for final recycling and disposal.

events.name: High-Capacity Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: The high-capacity battery supply chain consists of raw material production, materials processing, battery material manufacturing and cell fabrication, battery pack and end-use product manufacturing, and battery end-of-life and recycling.
events.description: The high-capacity battery supply chain consists of raw material production, materials processing, battery material manufacturing and cell fabrication, battery pack and end-use product manufacturing, and battery end-of-life and recycling.

events.name: Raw Material Production
events.wd_description: The extraction and production of raw materials essential for battery manufacturing.
events.description: The extraction and production of raw materials essential for battery manufacturing.

events.name: Materials Processing
events.wd_description: The processing of raw materials into forms suitable for battery manufacturing.
events.description: The processing of raw materials into forms suitable for battery manufacturing.

events.name: Battery Material Manufacturing and Cell Fabrication
events.wd_label: Battery Material Manufacturing and Cell Fabrication
events.wd_description: The manufacturing of battery materials and the fabrication of battery cells.
events.description: The manufacturing of battery materials and the fabrication of battery cells.

events.name: Battery Pack and End-Use Product Manufacturing
events.wd_label: Battery Pack and End-Use Product Manufacturing
events.wd_description: The assembly of battery packs and their integration into end-use products.
events.description: The assembly of battery packs and their integration into end-use products.

events.name: Battery End-of-Life and Recycling
events.wd_description: The collection, disassembly, and recycling of batteries at the end of their life cycle.
events.description: The collection, disassembly, and recycling of batteries at the end of their life cycle.

events.name: FOA Focus Areas
events.wd_description: The FOA will focus on reducing the costs of battery recycling through improved technologies, processes, and product designs, including the recycling of battery accessory components.
events.description: The FOA will focus on reducing the costs of battery recycling through improved technologies, processes, and product designs, including the recycling of battery accessory components.

events.name: Transportation and Preprocessing Technologies
events.wd_description: Technologies and processes that facilitate the transport, disassembly, and preprocessing of end-of-life electric drive vehicle batteries to reduce costs.
events.description: Technologies and processes that facilitate the transport, disassembly, and preprocessing of end-of-life electric drive vehicle batteries to reduce costs.

events.name: Safety Improvements
events.wd_description: Technologies and product designs that improve the safety of transporting and disassembling end-of-life electric drive vehicle batteries.
events.description: Technologies and product designs that improve the safety of transporting and disassembling end-of-life electric drive vehicle batteries.

events.name: Accessory Component Recycling
events.wd_description: Technologies and processes for the recycling and disposal of battery accessory components, including casings and enclosures made from plastics and polymer composites.
events.description: Technologies and processes for the recycling and disposal of battery accessory components, including casings and enclosures made from plastics and polymer composites.
